text: I am noticing that HubSpot caches references to modules inside of templates, which can lead to interesting errors and behavior where some modules are no longer rendering on a template because their path has changed. Is there a recommended approach to clearing the module cache so that templates can fetch modules from their new paths?

More specifically, I have recently reorganized the directory structure of where we store our templates and modules during the local development flow, and have updated all `{% module path="" %}` values to reflect their new location. However, I still notice in "Developer Info" when navigating to these pages that there still exist modules that refer to the old location, and some modules will occasionally stop rendering on the template.
